summary: This document is a certification from a FedEx Express Senior Paralegal Specialist and Custodian of Records, attesting that the accompanying documents are authentic business records made at or near the time of the events described, kept in the regular course of business, and made as a regular practice. It is part of the evidence collection in the Epstein case, likely certifying shipping or delivery records.

persons.role: Senior Paralegal Specialist and Custodian of Records at FedEx Express
persons.context: The individual certifies under penalty of perjury that the accompanying FedEx business records are authentic and were created and maintained in the regular course of business.

events.title: Certification of FedEx Business Records
events.description: A Senior Paralegal Specialist and Custodian of Records at FedEx Express executes a sworn certification attesting to the authenticity of business records being provided, likely in response to a subpoena.

keyFacts: This document certifies that FedEx business records provided are authentic, created at or near the time of the events, and kept in the regular course of business.
The certification is executed under penalty of perjury by a FedEx Express Senior Paralegal Specialist and Custodian of Records.
The document is part of a litigation or investigation evidence collection, indicating that FedEx records were subpoenaed in the Epstein case.
